special_notes: "Please note that due to the printers' strike, the issues of October 11th, 18th, 25th, November 1st and December 6th, were sent to subscribers only, and consequently the returns for several issues following these dates were unusually heavy. It is this that has brought the average down so low." (Publisher's Remarks)

"Please note that due to the printers' strike, the issues of October 11th, 18th, 25th, November 1st and December 6th, were sent to subscribers only, and consequently the returns for several issues following these dates were unusually heavy. It is this that has brought the average down so low." (Publisher's Remarks)

"Actual figures for the December 27, 1919 issue are not available." (Publisher's Remarks)
